00021 #ifndef _SIMPLETIMECONSTMAPPING_H
00022 #define _SIMPLETIMECONSTMAPPING_H
00023 
00024 #include "MiXiMDefs.h"
00025 #include "Mapping.h"
00026 
00032 class MIXIM_API SimpleTimeConstMapping: public SimpleConstMapping {
00033 
00034 protected:
00035   double myValue;
00036   simtime_t start, stop;
00037 public:
00041   SimpleTimeConstMapping(double _myValue, simtime_t_cref _start, simtime_t_cref _stop):
00042     SimpleConstMapping(DimensionSet(Dimension::time)), myValue(_myValue), start(_start), stop(_stop) {
00043     initializeArguments(Argument(_start), Argument(_stop), Argument(1));
00044   }
00045   virtual ~SimpleTimeConstMapping() {}
00046 
00050   double getValue(const Argument& pos) const { return myValue; }
00051 
00055   ConstMapping* constClone() const {
00056     return new SimpleTimeConstMapping(myValue, start, stop); }
00057 };
00058 
00059 #endif
